# Library

```{r}
library(DescTools)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(pastecs)
library(naniar)
```

# Load data

```{r}
## Loading 
data_location = here("Primary Data Analysis ASU", "APHA","Data", "cleandata", "March25.rds")
March25 = readRDS(data_location)

```

## Subsetting the survey in order to just contain vaccine hesitancy questions

### Clinical Barriers
```{r}
Clinical_Barrier <- subset(March25, select = c(Question_44:Question_53))
```

### Access Barriers
```{r}
Access_Barrier <- subset(March25, select = c(Question_54:Question_57))
```

### Information Barriers
```{r}
Information_Barrier <- subset(March25, select = c(Question_58:Question_61))
```

### Trust Barriers
```{r}
Trust_Barrier <- subset(March25, select = c(Question_62:Question_66))
```

### Religious Barriers
```{r}
Religious_Barrier <- subset(March25, select = c(Question_67:Question_71))
```
